text: new paragraph rental of shared facilities termination amend rsa by inserting after paragraph iii the following new paragraph the process for termination of tenancy of a shared facility described by paragraphs shall apply in place of the eviction process detailed in rsa shared facilities governed by this chapter shall not be subject to the eviction process of rsa rental of shared facilities remedies amend rsa to read as follows remedies violations of this chapter shall be subject to the remedies set forth in rsa however a tenant of a shared facility must identify in the petition which may be by a checkbox on the circuit court s form petition that their rental is governed by rsa a tenant shall not enjoy the remedies set forth in rsa in regard to tenant lockout if the owner or agent of the owner of the shared facility has complied with the requirements of rsa
